amendment.description: To require a study of the feasibility of establishing an ethane storage and distribution hub in the United States.

vote.text: Amendment SA 3063 agreed to in Senate by Voice Vote.

action.text: Amendment SA 3063 proposed by Senator Murkowski for Senator Capito to Amendment SA 2953.
